mapper.sql: id, fjhao, luoceng, jibie, jiage, fuzeren, state, remark
mapper.insert: insert into fangjian_t (fjhao, luoceng, jibie, jiage, fuzeren, state, remark) values (#{fjHao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{luoCeng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jiBie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jiaGe,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{fuzeRen,jdbcType=VARCHAR,}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update fangjian_t set fjhao = #{fjHao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, luoceng = #{luoCeng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jibie = #{jiBie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jiage = #{jiaGe,jdbcType=FLOAT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fuzeren = #{fuzeRen,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select fjhao from fangjian_t where 1=1
and state = #{state}
